alert.note: Alert for Door; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 4:12AM CST until March 06 at 12:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...FAST MOVING STORM SYSTEM TO BRING A WINTRY MIX OF PRECIPITATION TO THE AREA TONIGHT INTO MONDAY... .Low pressure will track from the Central Plains tonight to the Michigan/Indiana border by late Monday. The system will bring widespread precipitation to the area tonight and Monday. The precipitation will be mainly snow tonight, and the snow could be heavy at times across central and east-central Wisconsin. The snow will taper to occasional light snow and freezing drizzle across central and east-central Wisconsin very late tonight and Monday morning. Temperatures edging above freezing across east-central and portions of central Wisconsin Monday may result in just rain. Periods of light snow and possibly some freezing drizzle will continue across the north on Monday. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 6 inches. * WHERE...Door, Southern Marinette County, and Southern Oconto County Counties. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to Noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Door; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
